name: canvas-quiz-parser
description: Parse Canvas Quizzes via the API into portable JSON

scripts.start: rimraf lib && mkdir lib && babel src --watch --out-file lib/index.js
scripts.build: eslint src && rimraf lib && mkdir lib && babel src --out-file lib/index.js

author: Alexander Rao <alexhrao@gmail.com> (https://alexhrao.github.io)
